ygData.subject: Re: bonus stat allocation
ygData.msgSnippet: I am VERY sure.  I created him on the day of release.  When I had suspected this I tested it.  I looked at and wrote down all of my stats when I died and was
ygData.messageBody:
I am VERY sure. I created him on the day of release. When I had
suspected this I tested it. I looked at and wrote down all of my
stats when I died and was naked once. Then I went and created a NEW
Half-Elf bard and the base stats pre-allocation were the exact same.
I also don't remember ever doing it ;) I think they changed it AFTER
I created my bard.

~Beatdrop

--- In eqbards@egroups.com, "John Beckemeier" <Beckemej@h...> wrote:
> Hmm, when I tried to create an erudite necro in a hurry just to
explore
> Paineel for a few minutes, it wouldn't let me proceed until I'd
allocated
> all stat points. You sure you didn't allocate those points?
>
>
>
